home.name: I'm Júlia Luelmo.
home.intro: Graduated in Advertising and Public Relations from Universitat Pompeu Fabra, with a specialization in Public Relations. Experienced in corporate communication and coordination of campaigns and events. Passionate about effective communication and the creation of clear and strategic content. Seeking opportunities to apply and further develop my skills in corporate environments.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I have worked for over a year as a communications manager in a legal consultancy, managing clients’ digital communication in a comprehensive way. My main responsibilities included writing and publishing professional content on LinkedIn, updating corporate websites in WordPress, implementing SEO improvements and content optimization, coordinating with clients and resolving inquiries, as well as using office and digital tools for document management.
about.paragraph2: Additionally, I have experience managing social media for various projects, creating strategic content and planning posts to maintain a consistent online presence. I am motivated to work in dynamic and collaborative environments, contributing clarity, organization, and efficiency to every project, while continuing to develop my skills in corporate and digital communication.
